Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spotkania
programme.desc: Cykl prezentujący wyselekcjonowany zbiór najlepszych filmów krótkometrażowych. Wiele z nich nagrodzonych zostało prestiżowymi wyróżnieniami na międzynarodowych galach i festiwalach filmowych. Każde pasmo przedstawia kilka produkcji na dany temat.

credits.actor: Alexander Karim, Malin Buska, Thomas Bo Larsen, Nicolaj Kopernikus, Johannes Lassen, Andre Christenson, Henning Valin Jakobsen, Sara Hjort Ditlevsen, Liv Mjönes
Alexander Karim, Malin Buska, Thomas Bo Larsen, Nicolaj Kopernikus, Johannes Lassen, Andre Christenson, Henning Valin Jakobsen, Sara Hjort Ditlevsen, Liv Mjönes

programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

credits.actor: Paweł Małaszyński, Ilona Ostrowska, Eryk Lubos, Tomasz Schuchardt, Sebastian Fabijański, Piotr Rogucki, Mikołaj Krawczyk, Marcin Piętowski, Dawid Zawadzki

programme.title: Transfer kosmicznej energii
programme.desc: Radek jest ambitnym coachem motywacyjnym. Robi karierę w korporacji. Mężczyzna traci pewność siebie w momencie, gdy uczestniczy w bójce w knajpie. Decyduje się na nielegalne techniki hakowania mózgu. Niestety rezultaty są inne, niż się spodziewał.

programme.title: Kiler
Kiler
programme.desc: Kiler: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Cezary Pazura, Malgorzata Kozuchowska, Jerzy Stuhr, Janusz Rewinski. An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0127626/","name":"Kiler","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDRkNWMxYWEtODUwMC00ZDRjLWI0MmQtMjFjNTFiMDYwZDZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjExODE1MDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0127626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cjpok"},"dateCreated":"1999-06-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lots of action with funny twists","reviewBody":"This could easily be called the Polish version of "Pulp Fiction" but thank God, it is not. It is captivating from the very get-go, keeping the viewing audience as hostage to the very end. Although unique in style and approach, it is universal and could appeal to any audience, anywhere in the world. Humorous and tastefully prepared.No wonder Hollywood already bought rights to the story. We may see it on this side of the pond. I hope without Bruce Willis or other Hollywood screen "heroes". This story deserves better!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6505,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1997-11-17","keywords":"character name as title,serial murder,surname as title,one word title,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0668640/","name":"Cezary Pazura"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0469021/","name":"Malgorzata Kozuchowska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0836136/","name":"Jerzy Stuhr"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093411/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093398/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0921264/","name":"Piotr Weresniak"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu
I znowu zgrzeszyliśmy, dobry Boże!
Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?
programme.desc:
Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?: Directed by Philippe de Chauveron. With Christian Clavier, Chantal Lauby, Ary Abittan, Medi Sadoun. Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis: their four daughters' spouses--David, Rachid, Chao, and Charles--have decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they imagine their lives elsewhere." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6556670/","name":"Qu'est-ce qu'on a encore fait au bon Dieu?","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ0MTRiNmUtYTAyYi00NGViLWExYjEtYzQwZWEyZWFmMDQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Claude and Marie Verneuil face a new crisis: their four daughters' spouses--David, Rachid, Chao, and Charles--have decided to leave France for various reasons. Here they imagine their lives elsewhere.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6556670/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"georgioskarpouzas"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Treating serious matters in a lighter vein","reviewBody":"Having watched the first movie I decided to give a chance to the second bearing in mind that often the continuation of a successful recipe does not live up to the original movie. This observation was confirmed although the second film is still very funny. I have to admit that it is full of commonplaces and cliches to an annoying degree. The truth is that you laugh and that is the aim of a comedy. There is no originality in the jokes, they are as commonplace and trite as you could imagine but I found myself laughing most of the time.

The plot is simple. The bourgeois elderly couple strives to keep their four daughters in France while the latter under the instigation of their foreign husbands seek to pursue their luck outside their country to destinations linked with the origins of their spouses. The lengths to which the paterfamilias and his wife go to incite their daughters and grooms to remain in France inspire the main comedy effect of the film.

It is important to note that the scenario is very apt concerning current affairs in French society so that anyone closely following developments in French social reality will recognize imediately that important and "heavy" matters dividing national opinion such as immigration, integration and tolerance towards Muslim practices or legalization of homosexual marriage are treated in a lighter vein and produce ample laughter despite their insoluble and often tragic aspects in real life.

I recommend this movie which without being a masterpiece will appeal to those with a vivid interest in the dilemmas of postmodern multicultural society who are ready to put aside for a moment the often tragic connotations of those matters and accept the comic element which is inherent even in the most serious aspects of human social coexistence.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6901,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-01-30","keywords":"sequel,singing in a car,dysfunctional family,reference to donald trump,arab man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi385595929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjODc0ODItN2MyNC00MWVkLWEzZmQtZTQ0MDlhZWVjZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNThjODc0ODItN2MyNC00MWVkLWEzZmQtZTQ0MDlhZWVjZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002010/","name":"Christian Clavier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0490702/","name":"Chantal Lauby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2987278/","name":"Ary Abittan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0154385/","name":"Philippe de Chauveron"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0367060/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079764/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0718581/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491230/","name":"Guy Laurent"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0154385/","name":"Philippe de Chauveron"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: II koncert na wiolonczelę i orkiestrę
programme.desc: Pasją okulisty Macieja Gasika jest muzyka. W trakcie jednego z koncertów mężczyzna doznaje udaru mózgu. Staje się więźniem własnego ciała. Postanawia się nie poddawać i zawalczyć o swoją godność oraz wolność. Film na podstawie prawdziwej historii. Scenariusz stworzono do koncertu wiolonczelowego Pawła Mykietyna.

programme.desc: A Vigilante: Directed by Sarah Daggar-Nickson. With Olivia Wilde, Morgan Spector, Kyle Catlett, Estefania Tejeda. programme.title: Wolyn
Wołyń
programme.desc:
Wolyn: Directed by Wojciech Smarzowski. With Michalina Labacz, Arkadiusz Jakubik, Wasyl Wasylik, Adrian Zaremba. Despite being in love with a Ukrainian boy from the same village, Polish girl named Zosia is forced into marrying a wealthy widower. Soon World War II begins and ethnic tensions arise. Amidst the war chaos Zosia tries to survive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6068960/","name":"Wolyn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM4YTk3NzgtMmUxNy00NThlLWE3YzctOWJhNmQ4OTBiZTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY4MDEwMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Despite being in love with a Ukrainian boy from the same village, Polish girl named Zosia is forced into marrying a wealthy widower. Soon World War II begins and ethnic tensions arise. Amidst the war chaos Zosia tries to survive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6068960/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ktrelski"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Prepare yourself for sleepless night","reviewBody":"When I went to see this movie I thought I know everything about the events this picture is based on. I have heard that the movie will show them without any censorship. However, I was not prepared for the real horror of those events. The movie is graphic, but it does not go overboard. It does, however touch your soul. If you ever asked yourself what the real terror looks like, this is it. What makes it tough is that the terror is brought to you by the people you know well, your next door neighbors, your spouse or even your brother.

Do not expect anybody laughing or even talking after the movie is over. 

It is a great movie. Don't miss it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5393,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Drama","History","War"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"genocide,year 1943,world war two,massacre,nudity","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8443804/","name":"Michalina Labacz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1458971/","name":"Arkadiusz Jakubik"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8443805/","name":"Wasyl Wasylik"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500530/","name":"Wojciech Smarzowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692063/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692062/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500530/","name":"Wojciech Smarzowski"}],"duration":"PT2H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Planta permanente
Kafeteria
Planta permanente
programme.desc:
Planta permanente: Directed by Ezequiel Radusky. With Liliana Juárez, Rosario Bléfari, Verónica Perrotta, Nina Vera Suárez Bléfari. Lila and Marcela have always worked on the cleaning staff of a state office. They know its nooks and crannies better than anyone, and have found a way to support themselves - and a dream - running a clandestine kitchen in an abandoned corner of the building. But times change: a new director arrives, spouting cynical speeches full of clichés with a fistful of empty promises. The kitchen is closed and a wave of redundancies disrupts the precarious equilibrium in the office, making everyday tasks a struggle for survival." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11306358/","name":"Planta permanente","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE2ZDkyZjItYWIwMC00YmE0LTlmZTgtYWNiMWQ5ZGZhNTE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUwMDg1ODU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lila and Marcela have always worked on the cleaning staff of a state office. They know its nooks and crannies better than anyone, and have found a way to support themselves - and a dream - running a clandestine kitchen in an abandone","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11306358/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danybur"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that presents us with the centrality of work and its impact on ties","reviewBody":"Lila and Marcela (Liliana Juárez and Rosario Bléfari, in her last film role) are old friends and have been working for years as cleaning personnel in a provincial Public Works Department. Also a long time ago and as I searched, both run a dining room in an unoccupied sector of the building to which most of the employees willingly attend. The arrival of a new Director (Verónica Perrota), who recalls the speech and the ways of a recent and prominent governor, calls into question the job security of the staff and the continuity of the dining room.

What is disturbing about this film by Ezequiel Radusky is the chronicle of how the variation of the status quo takes the unexpected path of undermining the relationship of both friends and partners. On the other hand, the movements of Lila (a true entrepreneur) to preserve or reconvert her irregular "undertaking" against all odds are moving. Impossible not to love her after the remarkable performance of Liliana Juárez, winner of the award for best actress for this role at the last Mar del Plata Film Festival.

The harshness of some situations are resolved with the best resource: humor, in an arduous film in several senses.

In short, a film that presents us with the centrality of work (in situations that are not exclusive to public employment) and its impact on ties and to what extent individual resistance to power and adverse changes is a possible path or a trap.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":148,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-15","keywords":"work","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tráiler [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2604449817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWFhMjY5MTYtNDUwMC00Y2U1LWEzYmMtZjA4ZTc0MDIyNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWFhMjY5MTYtNDUwMC00Y2U1LWEzYmMtZjA4ZTc0MDIyNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4989891/","name":"Liliana Juárez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088164/","name":"Rosario Bléfari"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1213740/","name":"Verónica Perrotta"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4991308/","name":"Ezequiel Radusky"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250991/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0202630/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1195308/","name":"Diego Lerman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4991308/","name":"Ezequiel Radusky"}],"duration":"PT1H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Piąte: Nie odchodź!
programme.desc: 15-letniej Romie (Michalina Olszańska) umiera matka. Dziewczyna nie może sobie z tym poradzić. Ojciec, wzięty psychiatra Andrzej (Łukasz Simlat), jej tego nie ułatwia, gdyż jest pochłonięty pracą. Nastolatka znajduje ukojenie w intensywnych treningach tańca. Pewnego dnia spotyka małomównego mężczyznę, który wprowadził się do domu w sąsiedztwie.

programme.title: Rykoszety
Rykoszety
programme.desc: Rykoszety: Directed by Jakub Radej. With Stanislaw Linowski, Zuzanna Zielinska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Marta Scislowicz. Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. Two coal miner brothers react differently to the oppressive police state. While Tadek prefers to retreat into neutrality, Janek chooses active engagement in the democratic underground. When Janek asks Tadek to store some anti-government leaflets on the second anniversary of Solidarity's 1980 strikes, he triggers a spiral of events that will have everyone's allegiances and characters severely tested." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8658144/","name":"Rykoszety","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc0ZGJlOTUtYWM5NS00MjY3LWE5YzYtNWQxMjYyNDU5NjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. programme.title: Kona fer í stríð
Kobieta idzie na wojnę
Kona fer í stríð
programme.desc:
Kona fer í stríð: Directed by Benedikt Erlingsson. With Halldóra Geirharðsdóttir, Jóhann Sigurðarson, Juan Camilo Román Estrada, Jörundur Ragnarsson. Halla becomes a determined environmental activist, but this threatens a long-held hope of hers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7279188/","name":"Kona fer í stríð","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzJhYTBkMDktY2Q5Yy00M2MwLTg2MzQtZjFlMmRmMTc5OGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODAzODU1NDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Halla becomes a determined environmental activist, but this threatens a long-held hope of hers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7279188/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Pairic"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Comedy Eco-Thriller","reviewBody":"Woman At War: Halla (Halldóra Geirharðsdóttir) is angry. Angry at Rio Tinto whose smelter is damaging the pristine environment of Iceland. So she takes direct action, sabotaging electricity pylons, cutting off power to the smelter. There is more than just the smelter involved though. Halla's actions are putting at stake a resources exploitation deal between China and Iceland. Halla's gets inside information from a senior civil servant, Baldvin (Jörundur Ragnarsson), Baldvin is now worried that Halla will be caught, a satellite will be used to track her, and tries to persuade her to just issue a manifesto. Halaa gas another reason to reconsider her actions: she has been approved to adopt a girl.

This is a political thriller, a comedy with surreal overtones, an eco-action film. But foremost it is about the indomitable spirit of one woman who will have to make hard choices. When Halla is pursued by helicopters and drones she hides in crevices, uses the carcass of a dead sheep to fool heat-seeking radar. Discovers a long lost cousin, farmer Sveinbjörn (Jóhann Sigurðarson), who helps her escape. A three piece band and choir trio appear incongruously in scenes. Eventually the surreal turns existential, Halla goes to a rooftop to scatter copies of her manifesto, the band enter the action and tweet images of her proclamation,

Director & co-writer Benedikt Erlingsson delivers a delightful, funny but hard-hitting drama. 8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9004,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-05-22","keywords":"iceland,adoption,drone,helicopter,dog","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Woman At War Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2484779545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGViOWQwOGEtNzQxOC00ODQ1LTk3ZjEtYmNkMWNkZDFkNmFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGViOWQwOGEtNzQxOC00ODQ1LTk3ZjEtYmNkMWNkZDFkNmFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0311995/","name":"Halldóra Geirharðsdóttir"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797612/","name":"Jóhann Sigurðarson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5823636/","name":"Juan Camilo Román Estrada"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0259574/","name":"Benedikt Erlingsson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066263/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0575952/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0635308/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0259574/","name":"Benedikt Erlingsson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0251033/","name":"Ólafur Egilsson"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Der Krieger und die Kaiserin
Księżniczka i wojownik
Der Krieger und die Kaiserin
programme.desc:
Der Krieger und die Kaiserin: Directed by Tom Tykwer. With Franka Potente, Benno Fürmann, Joachim Król, Lars Rudolph. Two enamoured strangers look for a warm place in a cold world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0203632/","name":"Der Krieger und die Kaiserin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0ZDA0NDgtNzlmMy00MTY1LTk1NGUtYjE2MWRkODc2OTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA3Njg4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two enamoured strangers look for a warm place in a cold world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0203632/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"matzucker"},"dateCreated":"2000-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tykwer's "make-or-break" is a "make", but an uneasy one.","reviewBody":"Only a fool would expect this to be a second Run Lola Run. But unfortunately, there will be a lot of fools out there: This won't be the hit that Tykwer's former film was. And, just to say that: Run Lola Run still plays in a higher league.

But that's, of course, not to say that The Princess And The Warrior is a bad movie. Quite the contrary: there should be more films like this one. It's slow at times, yes, but to the ones with keen eyes it's meditative. It's metaphysical, in the end even surreal, it's down-to-earth, but at the same time very outlandish, it's a love story, but without the usual assets: there's no kissing, let alone sex; yes, even holding hands just occurs for a second. It's about a spiritual love, something epic, as the title suggests.

Many people won't like it; far too few people will love it. And I'm somewhere in between: It's a bold movie to make, especially in the dull (to be polite) movie scene of Germany, and a good one, too. Something refreshingly different (and wonderfully written, directed, shot and acted, I might add...). But somehow, you can't help feeling just a little disappointed after the milestone of modern film making that Tom Tykwer released two years ago.

8 out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14348,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2000-10-12","keywords":"f rated,nurse uniform,nurse outfit,caucasian,female nurse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi626768665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI4OWQ0NTMtZTYxNy00YmI3LThlZmUtZThiYWNlMWJlNGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI4OWQ0NTMtZTYxNy00YmI3LThlZmUtZThiYWNlMWJlNGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0299811/","name":"Benno Fürmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0473166/","name":"Joachim Król"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055954/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075650/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Basic Instinct
Nagi instynkt
Basic Instinct
programme.desc:
Basic Instinct: Directed by Paul Verhoeven. With Michael Douglas, Sharon Stone, George Dzundza, Jeanne Tripplehorn. A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103772/","name":"Basic Instinct","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk0YmJkNjItNDY3Mi00ZWFiLWEwY2EtMDJlZWJlOWZkNzJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103772/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tmensamaster-2"},"dateCreated":"2002-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Classic Verhoeven","reviewBody":"Paul Verhoeven is one of my favorite directors. His movies are so damn entertaining. They always, well I should say most of the time, have wit and intelligence [Forget 'Showgirls' and 'Hollow Man', any director can make mistakes] and have either graphic sex or violence or both. 'Basic Instinct' is in the latter category. It is so erotic and Stone and Douglas have so much sexual chemistry that when you look at an Adrian Lyne film, you see them for the crap they are.

Basic plotline has Stone's character, 'Catherine Tramell', accused of the vicious sex murder of a retired rock and roll star. Douglas's character has a strange attraction to her, which may not lead to good things..... Paul Verhoven has openly admitted that this film is a homage to Alfred Hitchcock's classic masterpiece 'Vertigo'. In fact, Stone wears, in sequence, the same wardrobe as Kim Novak did [which makes you wonder, was she wearing panties under her clothes]. That brings us to the interrogation scene, which is the best in the movie. Stone shamelessly flirts with the cops' libidos until the buildup of sexual tension is so great, Stone releases it by playing 'peek-a-boo' with the space in between her legs. Every male viewer cherishes that scene, simply because it is so sexy. That word can be used throughout the film, as Stone and Douglas do the mattress mumbo. At the time, the sex scenes were so realistic that the press went wild and debated whether or not viewers were witnessing un-simulated sex. The film is still quite sexually daring today and has an intriguing spider's web plot too. The plot's twists and turns manage to make the movie sexier as the viewer wonders whether Sharon is innocent or guilty..........

The film's only misstep occurs at the end, with an unsatisfactory ending that makes the whole film seem like some stupid, contrived game. But it's not. It keeps it's fascination and it's sexiness and its suspense right up till the end, which is what a good erotic thriller should. Actually, the ending for some will lead to a lot of discussion if you watch the film with someone, as the film toys with two of the film's characters innocence or guilt and does not give up all its secrets.....

The film is great Verhoeven. It has his usual, hilarious, seemingly inappropriate kinky humor and extreme sex and violence to match. The fact that Verhoeven is actually able to balance the film and make it funny and sexy is wonderful film-making. Well, have I said 'sexy' enough times? Then go rent it.........8/10

P.S. If you like this one, check out Verhoevens' Dutch film ''The Fourth Man''. It has a similar plot and even a similar character that resembles Catherine Tramell. If the ending of 'Basic Instinct' leaves you wanting, check that film out. It is even better than 'Basic' and is more 'arty'. It is also a little bit more daring erotically.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":188958,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1992-03-20","keywords":"erotic thriller,manipulation,female psychopath,narcissistic personality disorder,mind game","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Basic Instinct","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi129564953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEzYmZhZTAtMWVkYi00NWQ2LWIzNWQtNTYwOTI1ZmQ1ZjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEzYmZhZTAtMWVkYi00NWQ2LWIzNWQtNTYwOTI1ZmQ1ZjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000140/","name":"Michael Douglas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000232/","name":"Sharon Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001169/","name":"George Dzundza"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000682/","name":"Paul Verhoeven"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094459/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000390/","name":"Joe Eszterhas"}],"duration":"PT2H7M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0103772, Title: Basic Instinct, --- Description: Basic Instinct: Directed by Paul Verhoeven. With Michael Douglas, Sharon Stone, George Dzundza, Jeanne Tripplehorn. A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103772/","name":"Basic Instinct","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk0YmJkNjItNDY3Mi00ZWFiLWEwY2EtMDJlZWJlOWZkNzJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103772/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"tmensamaster-2","dateCreated":"2002-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Classic Verhoeven","reviewBody":"Paul Verhoeven is one of my favorite directors. His movies are so damn entertaining. They always, well I should say most of the time, have wit and intelligence [Forget 'Showgirls' and 'Hollow Man', any director can make mistakes] and have either graphic sex or violence or both. 'Basic Instinct' is in the latter category. It is so erotic and Stone and Douglas have so much sexual chemistry that when you look at an Adrian Lyne film, you see them for the crap they are.

Basic plotline has Stone's character, 'Catherine Tramell', accused of the vicious sex murder of a retired rock and roll star. Douglas's character has a strange attraction to her, which may not lead to good things..... Paul Verhoven has openly admitted that this film is a homage to Alfred Hitchcock's classic masterpiece 'Vertigo'. In fact, Stone wears, in sequence, the same wardrobe as Kim Novak did [which makes you wonder, was she wearing panties under her clothes]. That brings us to the interrogation scene, which is the best in the movie. Stone shamelessly flirts with the cops' libidos until the buildup of sexual tension is so great, Stone releases it by playing 'peek-a-boo' with the space in between her legs. Every male viewer cherishes that scene, simply because it is so sexy. That word can be used throughout the film, as Stone and Douglas do the mattress mumbo. At the time, the sex scenes were so realistic that the press went wild and debated whether or not viewers were witnessing un-simulated sex. The film is still quite sexually daring today and has an intriguing spider's web plot too. The plot's twists and turns manage to make the movie sexier as the viewer wonders whether Sharon is innocent or guilty..........

The film's only misstep occurs at the end, with an unsatisfactory ending that makes the whole film seem like some stupid, contrived game. But it's not. It keeps it's fascination and it's sexiness and its suspense right up till the end, which is what a good erotic thriller should. Actually, the ending for some will lead to a lot of discussion if you watch the film with someone, as the film toys with two of the film's characters innocence or guilt and does not give up all its secrets.....

The film is great Verhoeven. It has his usual, hilarious, seemingly inappropriate kinky humor and extreme sex and violence to match. The fact that Verhoeven is actually able to balance the film and make it funny and sexy is wonderful film-making. Well, have I said 'sexy' enough times? Then go rent it.........8/10

P.S. If you like this one, check out Verhoevens' Dutch film ''The Fourth Man''. It has a similar plot and even a similar character that resembles Catherine Tramell. If the ending of 'Basic Instinct' leaves you wanting, check that film out. It is even better than 'Basic' and is more 'arty'. It is also a little bit more daring erotically.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":188958,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1992-03-20","keywords":"erotic thriller,manipulation,female psychopath,narcissistic personality disorder,mind game","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Basic Instinct","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi129564953","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEzYmZhZTAtMWVkYi00NWQ2LWIzNWQtNTYwOTI1ZmQ1ZjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEzYmZhZTAtMWVkYi00NWQ2LWIzNWQtNTYwOTI1ZmQ1ZjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000140/","name":"Michael Douglas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000232/","name":"Sharon Stone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001169/","name":"George Dzundza"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000682/","name":"Paul Verhoeven"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094459/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000390/","name":"Joe Eszterhas"],"duration":"PT2H7M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Night in the Woods
A Night in the Woods
programme.desc: A Night in the Woods: Directed by Richard Parry. With Scoot McNairy, Anna Skellern, Andrew Hawley. Brody, his girlfriend Kerry and their friend Leo go hiking in Dartmoor's Wistman's Woods, so named because of its legendary haunted past. That night jealousies, sexual tensions and strained relationships come to a head turning what should have been a peaceful camping adventure into a trip to terror. As collective paranoia reaches fever pitch it becomes clear that there is a much darker force at work in the ancient eerie surroundings. Who or what is after them? And can any one of them survive a night in the woods?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1718714/","name":"A Night in the Woods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2MjI1MzE1NTJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDcyMjM5MTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brody, his girlfriend Kerry and their friend Leo go hiking in Dartmoor's Wistman's Woods, so named because of its legendary haunted past. That night jealousies, sexual tensions and strained relationships come to a head turning what s","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1718714/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2012-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sounds like ...","reviewBody":"Another offspring, another "Found Footage" Film. But should you judge a movie, just because it tries to ride a wave (you'd be missing out on some good movies, if you have prejudices). On the other hand, this movie does not have what it takes to really be considered a good entry into the "sub-genre".\n\nIt's not so much about the actors (given the roles they get), more about the script and the execution of it. I can't say that I think you'd be surprised. In any way that is. But even if that's not what you are looking for, with logic out the window what does remain, that makes this movie at least a bit worth-while? Only saving grace might be the sound design, which is quite nice.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":896,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-09-07","keywords":"woods,night,found footage,legend,camping","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.K. Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4160267545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4ODI2ODcxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ0NTkxOA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4ODI2ODcxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ0NTkxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On what is intended to be a fun camping trip to investigate and to chill in the atmosphere of the legendary haunted past of DartmoorÂ’s WistmanÂ’s Woods, Brody, his girlfriend Kerry and her cousin Leo very soon find themselves mysteriously ill at ease both with their surroundings and their companions."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1058940/","name":"Scoot McNairy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1317154/","name":"Anna Skellern"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2959893/","name":"Andrew Hawley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060017/","name":"Richard Parry"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113509/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060017/","name":"Richard Parry"}],"duration":"PT1H22M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Quarantine
Kwarantanna
Quarantine
programme.desc:
Quarantine: Directed by John Erick Dowdle. With Jennifer Carpenter, Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech. A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1082868/","name":"Quarantine","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0MDgwNTQ4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzQzNjY3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1082868/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Anonymous_Maxine"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simple, basic logic is unusually destructive here, even for a horror movie","reviewBody":"Quarantine starts off reasonably well, if not at all originally. A small film crew is doing a ride- along with the fire department to get a first hand look at what their daily professional lives are really like. The film is presented the film crew's unedited stock footage, so we get lots of video of the firemen acting not at all like firemen but instead like young men who are living in close quarters for long periods of time. Finally an interesting call comes in and the crew are called out to a building in town. 

Up to this point, the movie is presented in a style even more realistic than a documentary, because the footage that we see is not even edited. Once they arrive at the building, of course, weird things start happening.

You know the premise, the movie is essentially a zombie movie, but a lot of the suspense and tension is predicated on the fact that this group of innocent people have been for some reason barricaded inside a building by the police, government, military, whatever. Soon we find out that it's the Center For Disease Control doing the quarantining, but the point is, the people that are meant to protect us are locking these innocent people inside a building and leaving them for dead and the people inside have no idea why.

But here's my first question, how do you lock an entire modern fire crew inside an old, dilapidated building presumably made primarily of plaster and wood? Later they discover that approaching windows is enough to get yourself shot, but after what happened soon after they arrived at the building, I am willing to bet that none of those guys would have been willing to spend more than two or three minutes locked unwillingly inside the building.

Next, it seems that breaking through plaster walls is not the only bit of standard fireman training that these guys are lacking. When people start getting hurt, at one point one of the firemen calls out, "Is there a doctor in the house?" I had been under the impression that in order to be a fireman you have to have some emergency medical treatment training, but I could be wrong. I had to do the training in order to be a summer camp counselor a couple years ago, but maybe sleep-away camps are just stricter than your typical major city fire department.

Jennifer Carpenter is the lead character, the host of the documentary that the film crew was making. You may remember her from The Exorcism of Emily Rose, the astonishingly scary horror film that she starred in back in 2004. Sadly, Quarantine just doesn't have the story or the content to give her much to do except run around looking scared. Her performance as Emily Rose was one of the best horror performances I've ever seen, but Quarantine just gives the feeling that she's waiting for an opportunity or a good reason to do some real horror acting.

Overall the movie is not bad, but it is overwhelmingly casual in its presentation of a typical horror movie, this time with the slight variation that all of the victims are trapped in close quarters with the zombies. They have zombies trying to get them inside the building, and humans on the outside pointing guns at the building to prevent any escape and outbreak of the virus causing the zombiness.

There is an interesting scene where the cameraguy actually uses the camera to bludgeon one of the zombies to death, which provides a unique point of view. I had never seen a zombie killed in a movie like that before, but other than that there is just not much special about the movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-01-07","keywords":"found footage,apartment building,trapped,virus,quarantine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Quarantine","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3133276441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAzMDM1Njg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDk0OTAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAzMDM1Njg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDk0OTAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Quarantine - Theatrical Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1358539/","name":"Jennifer Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004996/","name":"Steve Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1551922/","name":"Columbus Short"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235719/","name":"John Erick Dowdle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084207/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0245483/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235719/","name":"John Erick Dowdle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1803105/","name":"Drew Dowdle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0049371/","name":"Jaume Balagueró"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

They have zombies trying to get them inside the building, and humans on the outside pointing guns at the building to prevent any escape and outbreak of the virus causing the zombiness.

There is an interesting scene where the cameraguy actually uses the camera to bludgeon one of the zombies to death, which provides a unique point of view. I had never seen a zombie killed in a movie like that before, but other than that there is just not much special about the movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-01-07","keywords":"found footage,apartment building,trapped,virus,quarantine","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Quarantine","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3133276441","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAzMDM1Njg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDk0OTAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAzMDM1Njg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDk0OTAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Quarantine - Theatrical Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1358539/","name":"Jennifer Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004996/","name":"Steve Harris","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1551922/","name":"Columbus Short"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235719/","name":"John Erick Dowdle"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084207/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0245483/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235719/","name":"John Erick Dowdle","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1803105/","name":"Drew Dowdle","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0049371/","name":"Jaume Balagueró"],"duration":"PT1H29M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Killer Bees
Mordercze pszczoły
Killer Bees!
programme.desc: Killer Bees: Directed by Penelope Buitenhuis. With C. Thomas Howell, Tracy Nelson, Fiona Loewi, Noel Fisher. After a truck accident causes their release, a small rural town is faced with a swarm of killer bees." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0353625/","name":"Killer Bees","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU5OTU2NzAtNTA5Ny00MTc3LTlkOGMtNjIxMzVmOTA0MTlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIzMTQ5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a truck accident causes their release, a small rural town is faced with a swarm of killer bees.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0353625/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Vomitron_G"},"dateCreated":"2010-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Invasion of the Black Killer Dots","reviewBody":"Oh boy, C. Thomas Howell has sunk so low... He did "The Hitcher", for Pete's sake! Here, he's starring in this poor soap-opera quality vehicle as a sheriff whose town gets infected by a plague of poor CGI killer dots. No thrills, no action, cinematography that gets painfully awful at some times and a final shot (involving a swarm of more killer dots) portraying that this silly nightmare isn't over yet. Please make it stop. And since this was made for TV, you might get the idea...: No gore and nudity either. Only watch it in a case where you feel you could die of boredom. Otherwise, avoid it, or you might as well watch "Swarmed" (2005) instead. That one's at least a bit of fun, and stars Tim Thomerson, everybody's favorite B-movie actor. Thomerson will kick Howell's ass any day. I don't care if Howell took on Hauer in the 80's. He sure lost it now.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-11-19","keywords":"psychotronic film,creature feature,bee,killer bee,bee attack","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001367/","name":"C. programme.title: Mind Blown
programme.desc: Grupa telekinetyków, w tym Jennifer (Jessica Uberuaga), zostaje zaproszona do udziału w tajnym projekcie militarnym o kryptonimie Mind Blown, na którego czele stoi płk Clayton (Steve Hanks). Naukowcy mają nadzieję na humanitarną misję, dzięki której pomogą ludzkości zmierzyć się z siłami natury. Jak się okazuje, ich zdolności zostają wykorzystane w zbrodniczych celach.

programme.title: Christmas Icetastrophe
Oblodzone miasto
Christmas Icetastrophe
programme.desc:
Christmas Icetastrophe: Directed by Jonathan Winfrey. With Victor Webster, Jennifer Spence, Richard Harmon, Tiera Skovbye. A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3993802/","name":"Christmas Icetastrophe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4NTc4MzQzNDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE2NzA4NjUx._V1_.jpg","description":"A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3993802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"story_by_corey"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you are fascinated by things being flash frozen, you will like this movie","reviewBody":"In a nutshell.....asteroid hits town starting to celebrate Christmas, Santa gets flash frozen, people scream, people flee and good looking lead actor and actress save town just before everyone is flash frozen. 

Too bad Mystery Science Theater is not still on TV, because this movie is perfect for it. There is no story line, no character development, no acting of note, no anything other than wall-to-wall things/people being flash frozen. There is not even a point to who is/isn't flash frozen. But trying to find something positive to say, it does have a lot of actors who were in other shows/movies that were much better. 

Its just a classically bad sci-fi movie and the kind of movie for people who are into such things.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-12-20","keywords":"disaster film,meteorite,ice,small town,meteor","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005543/","name":"Victor Webster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817780/","name":"Jennifer Spence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113653/","name":"Richard Harmon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934912/","name":"Jonathan Winfrey"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0496864/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2579139/","name":"David Sanderson"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3993802/","name":"Christmas Icetastrophe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4NTc4MzQzNDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE2NzA4NjUx._V1_.jpg","description":"A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3993802/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"story_by_corey","dateCreated":"2014-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you are fascinated by things being flash frozen, you will like this movie","reviewBody":"In a nutshell.....asteroid hits town starting to celebrate Christmas, Santa gets flash frozen, people scream, people flee and good looking lead actor and actress save town just before everyone is flash frozen. 

Too bad Mystery Science Theater is not still on TV, because this movie is perfect for it. There is no story line, no character development, no acting of note, no anything other than wall-to-wall things/people being flash frozen. There is not even a point to who is/isn't flash frozen. But trying to find something positive to say, it does have a lot of actors who were in other shows/movies that were much better. 

Its just a classically bad sci-fi movie and the kind of movie for people who are into such things.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-12-20","keywords":"disaster film,meteorite,ice,small town,meteor","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005543/","name":"Victor Webster","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817780/","name":"Jennifer Spence","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113653/","name":"Richard Harmon"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934912/","name":"Jonathan Winfrey"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0496864/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2579139/","name":"David Sanderson"],"duration":"PT1H26M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Riverbank
Na brzegu rzeki
The Riverbank
programme.desc: The Riverbank: Directed by John L'Ecuyer. With Rick Roberts, Kenneth Welsh, Kari Matchett, Cindy Doire. A woman returns to her hometown following the death of her fathers second wife, which leads her to uncover dark family secrets." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2124973/","name":"The Riverbank","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZlOGEyYzMtNTE3OS00NmEyLTgyZmUtZjMyZjE2NTIwM2Y4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY5MTYzNDA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman returns to her hometown following the death of her fathers second wife, which leads her to uncover dark family secrets.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2124973/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"phatandys"},"dateCreated":"2015-12-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Kari Matchett Reigns Supreme","reviewBody":"A really good movie. Of course Kari Matchett again hits it out of the ballpark with her usual aplomb, her performance alone is worth the time invested. But Kari didn't have to do all the heavy lifting because the casting of this movie is unusually strong. Inga Cadranel shined as she stood out among a really fine acting lineup, usually there is always at least one actor'ess/character who is unable to keep up but this movie's cast is really solid. Writing never lost track of the pace, nor insulted us with tropes, the mood was almost noir-like and I appreciated the writers not resorting to the easy-out way with their story. The direction was on a Hollywood feature level and the production levels were tops. You can tell those associated with this movie were pros. I have to say this again, if Kari Matchett is cast in a TV/Movie it is must see viewing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"genre":["Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-10-03","keywords":"open marriage,family secret,flashback,two word title","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0731519/","name":"Rick Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920564/","name":"Kenneth Welsh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558182/","name":"Kari Matchett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0478286/","name":"John L'Ecuyer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0389034/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075779/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5249971/","name":"Genni Gunn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524905/","name":"Graham Ludlow"}],"duration":"PT1H16M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Foolproof
Niezawodny plan
Foolproof
programme.desc:
Foolproof: Directed by William Phillips. With Ryan Reynolds, Kristin Booth, Joris Jarsky, Sean Sullivan. Kevin, Sam and Rob are founding members of a theoretical group which pulls off heists. Leo, a gangster, blackmails them into pulling off a real multi-million dollar heist. Now it's up to them to get out alive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0356614/","name":"Foolproof","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg4OWNiZmQtNTgzNC00OTBjLTkxYzEtZmQ1ZGU0NTI0Y2Q2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kevin, Sam and Rob are founding members of a theoretical group which pulls off heists. Leo, a gangster, blackmails them into pulling off a real multi-million dollar heist. Now it's up to them to get out alive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0356614/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"yak-yak"},"dateCreated":"2004-05-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"8/10 Good script, good acting, good plot, good soundtrack, intelligent caper.","reviewBody":"I loved this movie.

Foolproof is a pretty intelligent caper film that rises above standard caper/action movies that you get from, say, Arnold Schwarzenegger.

Acting: It was very good, but the acting from Ryan Reynolds was great. I found his delivery perfect for the role.

Script: The script was fairly intelligent but fell into a few standard-caper-script holes in a few spots. Overall the script maintained its character through the interpersonal banter, particularly with Reynolds.

Soundtrack: Excellent. Perhaps the greatest complement to an intelligent movie is a groovy soundtrack that helps keep the momentum of the film going. This soundtrack is groovy. Think Ocean's Eleven with George Clooney.

Plausibility: Well, here we have problems. Don't think this is realistic, just be thankful you don't have Arnie flying a Harrier jet. Hey, it's as plausible as Ocean's Eleven.

Overall, I really enjoyed this movie, and I would happily recommend it to almost anyone.

8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10132,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2005-05-11","keywords":"heist,warehouse,apartment,gangster,planning","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Foolproof","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4138139929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODI3ZWNkOTAtOWM1ZC00YzNiLWE3NGItMjg1NGNiMTc3ZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODI3ZWNkOTAtOWM1ZC00YzNiLWE3NGItMjg1NGNiMTc3ZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Lionsgate Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0095746/","name":"Kristin Booth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0419005/","name":"Joris Jarsky"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680889/","name":"William Phillips"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093742/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053578/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680889/","name":"William Phillips"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

Huang Feihong Zhi Yingxiong You Meng
programme.desc:
Huang feihong zhi yingxiong you meng: Directed by Roy Hin Yeung Chow. With Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Eddie Peng, Luodan Wang, Boran Jing. An orphan, whose father has been killed by dark power, attempts to bring justice back to the town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3469592/","name":"Huang feihong zhi yingxiong you meng","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGY5ZTcyMDEtYjk1NS00MGQ5LTgwNTUtMTZlZTQ2YzUxNGRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg0MTI5NzQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"An orphan, whose father has been killed by dark power, attempts to bring justice back to the town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3469592/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"GrungeRock"},"dateCreated":"2014-11-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining so to say","reviewBody":"I got a chance to watch this on premier in Hong Kong. Overall this is the comeback franchise of the Huang Feihong, which was popularized by Jet Li. Now the new actor Eddie Peng (from Taiwan) who portrays the prequel of the Huang Feihong least to say is quite good. This version I find it's more darker than the Jet Li version, but overall I truly quite enjoy the fighting scenes.

The show is narrated in Mandarin and not Cantonese as I would have expect. Overall I think that having a Mandarin version allows a wider coverage of spectators in Asia and China. 

The storyline is quite simple, basically it's tells about the young Huang Feihong joins the triad by showing his skills. But the underlying deep intention is to destroy the triad which has been smuggling illegal workers to overseas.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3523,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-11-21","keywords":"guangzhou china,harbor,dock,warehouse,opium den","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rise of the Legend","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2954803225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM1ZDRlOTItZjdjNi00Y2QyLWJiZTUtYWY4NmQ3Y2E2OTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM1ZDRlOTItZjdjNi00Y2QyLWJiZTUtYWY4NmQ3Y2E2OTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Rise of the Legend"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005033/","name":"Sammo Kam-Bo Hung"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2108643/","name":"Eddie Peng"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3437899/","name":"Luodan Wang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3469952/","name":"Roy Hin Yeung Chow"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0305837/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010281/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0233420/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1644613/","name":"Chi-long To"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Straw Dogs
Nędzne psy
Straw Dogs
programme.desc:
Straw Dogs: Directed by Rod Lurie. With James Marsden, Kate Bosworth, Alexander Skarsgård, James Woods. Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0999913/","name":"Straw Dogs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ1MTk5ODIzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU1MzgyMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0999913/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"room102"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good remake, although not as good as the original","reviewBody":"I expected this movie to be yet another terrible remake and turn it off after 15 minutes. But know know what? This was actually a good remake.

While the movie is very similar to the original, they did make some small changes here and there, mainly in the characters background and their motivation - which might help explain some things that seemed a bit odd in the original (for example, why would a beautiful blonde marry a geek). Others may claim the writer ruined some ideas.

It's hard and unfair to compare the actors' performance to Dustin Hoffman and David Warner in the original, but I have to say that all the cast actually did a decent job. James Woods was excellent as a southern redneck and Kate Bosworth was surprisingly good too. I'm not familiar with any of the other actors, who were all decent in their roles.

The ending had some small changes too - again, made in order for the characters to have a better motivation. Still, I prefer the ending of the original, which I recall was more intense and more "surreal", made to show a man protecting his "castle".

All in all, this remake is much better than many of the recent remakes I've seen (or chose to skip). Was this remake necessary? Probably not.
